doc:
Wanda Ventham https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wanda_Ventham 0 Wanda Ventham (born 5 August 1935) is an English actress, known primarily for her role as Colonel Virginia Lake in the 1970s science-fiction television series UFO, and for her recurring role as Cassandra Trotter's mother Pamela Parry in the sitcom Only Fools and Horses from 1989–92. She also appeared in two episodes of The Saint alongside Roger Moore. In April 2014, People magazine featured her in its "Most Beautiful People in the World" edition. Wanda_Ventham ( born_5_August_1935 ) is an_English_actress , known primarily for her_role as Colonel_Virginia_Lake in the_1970s_science-fiction_television_series_UFO , and for her_recurring_role as Cassandra_Trotter 's_mother_Pamela_Parry in the_sitcom Only_Fools_and_Horses from 1989 – 92 . She also appeared in two_episodes of The_Saint alongside Roger_Moore . In April_2014 , People_magazine featured her in its_"_Most_Beautiful_People in the_World_"_edition .
